control.enable:
#!/system/bin/sh

if [ $(cat /sys/module/max17048_battery/parameters/low_batt_disable_dyn_fsync) = Y ]
then
  echo 1
else 
  echo 0
fi
control.title: Disable Dynamic Fsync If Low Battery
control.description: When battery level less than 5% fsync operations is synchronous. Disabling this may cause data loss in case of system crash by too low battery voltage. If disabled critical level battery shutdown or cpu at max load with max display brightness battery voltage can drop below normal values.
